nodes.title: Learn programming fundamentals
bullets: Understand variables, control flow, functions, data structures, and algorithms using JavaScript or Python for web contexts and problem-solving.
Builds core logic and problem-solving skills necessary for both front-end and back-end development.

nodes.title: Master HTML & CSS basics
bullets: Learn semantic HTML elements, accessibility, layout, and responsive design using CSS and Flexbox/Grid for building web page structure.
Enables creation of well-structured, accessible web interfaces and prepares for framework integration.

nodes.title: JavaScript core concepts
bullets: Understand ES6+ syntax, DOM manipulation, asynchronous patterns (Promises, async/await), and modular code structure for client-side behavior.
Prepares for front-end frameworks and dynamic UI development.

nodes.title: Learn a modern front-end framework
bullets: Choose React, Vue, or Angular; learn component architecture, state management, props, lifecycle/hooks, and routing fundamentals.
Enables rapid UI development and maintainable front-end architectures used in industry.

nodes.title: Styling and UI tooling
bullets: Master CSS-in-JS, utility frameworks (Tailwind), responsive design patterns, and design systems for consistent UI development.
Improves developer productivity and UI consistency across projects.

nodes.title: Front-end testing and optimization
bullets: Learn unit, integration, and end-to-end testing with Jest, React Testing Library, or Cypress and performance optimization techniques.
Ensures reliability and fast user experiences in production applications.

nodes.title: Learn server-side language and framework
bullets: Pick Node.js/Express, Python/Django, Ruby/Rails, or similar; learn routing, middleware, templating, and RESTful API design.
Provides ability to build scalable APIs, server logic, and integrate with databases.

nodes.title: Databases and storage
bullets: Learn relational (PostgreSQL/MySQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) databases, query design, indexing, migrations, and ORMs.
Enables efficient data modeling, persistence, and retrieval strategies for applications.

nodes.title: API design and security
bullets: Master RESTful and GraphQL APIs, input validation, rate limiting, secure authentication (JWT, OAuth), and common vulnerabilities (OWASP).
Ensures robust, secure, and well-documented back-end services.

nodes.title: Version control and CI/CD
bullets: Use Git workflows (branches, PRs), and set up CI pipelines with GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, or similar for automated tests and builds.
Streamlines collaboration and automates quality checks before deployments.

nodes.title: Containerization and cloud basics
bullets: Learn Docker, container orchestration basics (Kubernetes intro), and deploy apps to cloud providers (AWS/GCP/Azure) or platforms (Heroku, Vercel).
Enables reproducible environments and scalable deployments for production applications.

nodes.title: Monitoring, observability, and testing
bullets: Implement logging, metrics, tracing (Prometheus, Grafana, Jaeger), and add end-to-end testing and load testing for reliability.
Ensures system health, capacity planning, and quick incident response.

nodes.title: Build projects and portfolio
bullets: Create diverse portfolio projects: CRUD apps, real-time apps, e-commerce, and CI/CD-deployed demos showcasing full-stack abilities.
Demonstrates practical skills to employers and supports interview readiness.

nodes.title: Interview preparation and soft skills
bullets: Prepare system design, algorithms, behavioral interviews, and improve communication, time management, and teamwork skills.
Helps secure roles and succeed in cross-functional engineering environments.

nodes.title: Specialize or advance skills
bullets: Choose specializations like DevOps, data engineering, mobile, or ML integration and pursue certifications or advanced topics accordingly.
Enables deeper career paths, higher impact roles, and technical leadership opportunities.
